changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet de contrôler son Karotz: This plugin allows you to control your Karotz (running under
index.md.Cela va de sa led ventrale, à ses oreill: This goes from his belly LED, to his ears through sounds, speech synthesis and many others
index.md.Afin d'utiliser le plugin, vous devez le: In order to use the plugin, you must download, install and activate it like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.Rendez vous dans le menu Plugins\/Commun: Go to the Plugins / Communication menu, you will find the Karotz plugin
index.md.Vous arriverez sur la page qui listera v: You will arrive on the page which will list your equipment (you can have several Karotz) and which will allow you to create some
index.md.Vous arriverez ensuite sur la page de co: You will then arrive on the configuration page of your karotz
index.md.Vous n'avez rien à faire dans cette sect: You have nothing to do in this section
index.md.bouton permettant de rafraîchir le widge: button to refresh the widget if necessary
index.md.permet de couper le clignotement de la l: allows to stop the flashing of the led
index.md.permet d'activer le clignotement de la l: activates the flashing of the led
index.md.permet d'arrêter une musique ou un son e: stop a music or a sound in progress
index.md.permet de réveiller le lapin en mode sil: allows to wake up the rabbit in silent mode
index.md.permet de lancer le mode horloge du lapi: allows launching the rabbit clock mode
index.md.permet de faire dire au lapin l'humeur s: allows the rabbit to tell the selected mood
index.md.permet de faire dire au lapin l'humeur i: allows the rabbit to say the mood indicated by its number
index.md.permet de faire dire au lapin une humeur: allows the rabbit to say a random mood
index.md.permet de bouger les oreilles de manière: allows you to move your ears randomly
index.md.permet de remettre les oreilles en posit: allows to return the ears to the initial position
index.md.permet de régler la position précise des: adjusts the precise position of both ears
index.md.permet de lancer un son du Karotz (bip p: allows to launch a Karotz sound (beep for example) by indicating its name
allows you to launch a Karotz sound (beep for example) by selecting its name in a list
index.md.permet de faire lire une URL au Karotz (: allows you to read a URL to the Karotz (radio station for example
index.md.permet d'activer le mode squeezebox du K: allows you to activate the Karotz squeezebox mode
index.md.permet de désactiver le mode squeezebox: allows to deactivate the Karotz squeezebox mode
index.md.permet de savoir si le Karotz est endorm: allows you to know if the Karotz is asleep (if not it is awake
index.md.permet d'avoir la couleur actuellement s: allows to have the color currently on the belly of the Karotz
index.md.permet de faire parler le lapin en chois: allows the rabbit to speak by choosing the voice and the message (by default the message is cached
allows to make the rabbit speak by choosing the voice and the message (the message is not cached
index.md.permet de régler la vitesse du clignotem: adjusts the speed of the flashing
index.md.permet de connaitre le % de disque utili: lets you know the% of disk used on the rabbit
index.md.valeur en Mo d'espace libre sur le lapin: value in MB of free space on the rabbit
index.md.permet de faire redémarrer (reboot) le l: allows you to reboot the rabbit
index.md.permet de remettre automatiquement le la: allows you to automatically reset the rabbit to the time (useful for changing the time
index.md.permet de choisir en % le niveau du volu: allows you to choose the volume level in% (recommended max 50%, risk of distortion above
index.md.permet de prendre une photo par le lapin: allows to take a photo by the rabbit
index.md.permet d'effacer toutes les photos prise: allows you to delete all the photos taken by the rabbit (frees up disk space
index.md.permet de mettre à jour la liste des pho: allows updating the list of preserved photos
index.md.permet de télécharger (par ftp) les phot: allows you to download (by ftp) the photos stored on the disk (they are not deleted
index.md.Toutes ces commandes sont disponibles vi: All these commands are available via the scenarios
index.md.La commande TTS peut comporter plusieurs: The TTS command can have several options separated by &
index.md.Quelle est la fréquence de rafraîchissem: How often is the information refreshed
index.md.Le système récupère les informations tou: The system retrieves the information every 30 minutes or after a request to change the rabbit's color or state
index.md.Vous pouvez cliquer sur la commande Rafr: You can click the Refresh command to refresh manually
